account_identifier.description: The identifier for the platform account to fund.

amount.description: The amount to add to the account (and thus, charge the credit card), in cents.

client_ip.description: The IP address of the person making the purchase.

cc_token.description: The payment token issued at registration time.

security_code.description: The 3 or 4-digit card security code (CVV2, CVC2, or CID).
